Uses of Class
edu.rit.pj2.Job

  • Packages that use Job 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2.example
    Package edu.rit.pj2.example contains example programs illustrating how to do parallel programming with the Parallel Java 2 Library.
    edu.rit.pj2.test
    Package edu.rit.pj2.test contains unit test programs for the classes in package edu.rit.pj2.
    edu.rit.pjmr
    Package edu.rit.pjmr contains Parallel Java Map Reduce (PJMR), a simple parallel map-reduce framework built on top of Parallel Java 2.
    edu.rit.pjmr.example
    Package edu.rit.pjmr.example contains example programs using Parallel Java Map Reduce (PJMR) a simple parallel map-reduce framework built on top of Parallel Java 2, in package edu.rit.pjmr.
    edu.rit.pjmr.util
    Package edu.rit.pjmr.util contains general utility classes and programs for Parallel Java Map Reduce (PJMR) in package edu.rit.pjmr.

    • Uses of Job in edu.rit.pj2.example

      Subclasses of Job in edu.rit.pj2.example 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BCAClu
      Class BCAClu is a cluster parallel program that computes the evolution of a binary cellular automaton (CA).
      class  CCAClu
      Class CCAClu is a hybrid SMP cluster parallel program that calculates the evolution of a continuous cellular automaton and stores the result in a grayscale PNG image file.
      class  HamCycClu
      Class HamCycClu is a cluster parallel program that finds a Hamiltonian cycle in a graph via exhaustive search.
      class  MandelbrotClu
      Class MandelbrotClu is a cluster parallel program that calculates the Mandelbrot Set.
      class  MineCoinClu
      Class MineCoinClu is a cluster parallel program that does a simplified version of Bitcoin mining.
      class  MineCoinClu2
      Class MineCoinClu2 is a cluster parallel program that does a simplified version of Bitcoin mining.
      class  MineCoinClu3
      Class MineCoinClu3 is a cluster parallel program that does a simplified version of Bitcoin mining.
      class  MinVerCovClu3
      Class MinVerCovClu3 is a cluster parallel program that finds a minimum vertex cover of a graph via heuristic search.
      class  MinVerCovDist
      Class MinVerCovDist is a multicore cluster parallel program that investigates the distribution of minimum vertex covers in random graphs.
      class  PiClu
      Class PiClu is a cluster parallel program that calculates an approximate value for π using a Monte Carlo technique.
      class  TotientClu
      Class TotientClu is a cluster parallel program that computes the Euler totient of a number.
      class  ZombieClu
      Class ZombieClu is a cluster parallel program to compute the motion of a group of zombies.

      class  Test14
      Class Test14 is a unit test main program for classes Job and Task.
      class  Test15
      Class Test15 is a unit test main program for the master-worker cluster parallel for loop capability in methods Job.masterFor(int,int,Class) and Task.workerFor().
      class  Test16
      Class Test16 is a unit test main program for the master-worker cluster parallel for loop capability in methods Job.masterFor(long,long,Class) and Task.workerFor().

    • Uses of Job in edu.rit.pjmr

      Subclasses of Job in edu.rit.pjmr 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PjmrJob<IK,IV,OK,OV extends Vbl>
      Class PjmrJob is the abstract base class for a map-reduce job in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.

    • Uses of Job in edu.rit.pjmr.example

      Subclasses of Job in edu.rit.pjmr.example 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Concordance01
      Class Concordance01 is the main program for a PJMR map-reduce job that computes a concordance of one or more text files.
      class  Concordance02
      Class Concordance02 is the main program for a PJMR map-reduce job that computes a concordance of one or more text files.
      class  Concordance03
      Class Concordance03 is the main program for a PJMR map-reduce job that computes a concordance of one or more text files.
      class  Concordance04
      Class Concordance04 is the main program for a PJMR map-reduce job that computes a concordance of one or more text files in a directory.
      class  MaxTemp01
      Class MaxTemp01 is the main program for a PJMR map-reduce job that analyzes climate data files from the U.S.
      class  WebLog01
      Class WebLog01 is the main program for a PJMR map-reduce job that analyzes web server log files.

    • Uses of Job in edu.rit.pjmr.util

      Subclasses of Job in edu.rit.pjmr.util 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ScatterFiles
      Class ScatterFiles is a cluster parallel program for scattering the files in a directory among the nodes of a cluster parallel computer.
      class  ScatterLines
      Class ScatterLines is a cluster parallel program for scattering the lines in one or more text files among the nodes of a cluster parallel computer.
